author: Staff Reporter
title: Coronavirus | Dharavi reports two more cases
description: MP asks Uddhav to lock down slum; around 78 people have been actually tested for the virus in Dharavi.
content: As Dharavi reported two more positive cases of the coronavirus on Tuesday, Shiv Sena MP from the area Rahul Shewale has demanded that Asias biggest slum be locked down. He has demanded that every resident of the slum, with a population of eight lakh, be teste… [+2363 chars]
